ACADEMIC PROJECT  
PROJECT TITLE  : UNDER GROUND CABLE  FAULT DISTANCE LOCATOR  
DESCRIPTION :  
 The aim of this project is to determine the fault location  of underground cable from 
base station  by using microcontroller . 
 This project uses the simple concept of OHM ’s law. When any fault like short circuit 
occurs, voltage drop will vary depending on the length of fault in cable, since the 
current varies.  
 we detect the exact location of short circuit fault in the underground cab le from 
feeder end in kilometers  by using microcontroller  8051.  So, i t can be easily detected 
and repaired.
